entry.title: Not Until You Say Goodbye
entry.summary:
Author: Mat_Vibes

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 12,556Chapters: 3/?Kudos: 7

Summary: What if the end of the world wasn’t just about destruction—but about love rewriting fate?In this story, Tim Drake is pulled into NERV, an organization that controls powerful mechs to fight off monstrous beings known as Angels. But saving the world is only half the battle—he also has to deal with all sorts of problems, especially his love-struck brothers and his own complicated feelings.As Tim faces powerful enemies to protect humanity, love, trust, and heartbreak start to shift the story from a tale of survival to something more—something deeper. Because in a world where everything seems predetermined, can the love between two people be enough to change destiny itself?If you’re looking for an epic mix of high-stakes action, deep emotions, and a love story powerful enough to defy fate—this is for you.
